name: Damien GUEDES, et al., applicants, v. BUREAU OF ALCOHOL, TOBACCO, FIREARMS AND EXPLOSIVES, et al.
name_abbreviation: Guedes v. Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms & Explosives

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

judges: Justice THOMAS and Justice GORSUCH would grant the application.
parties:
Damien GUEDES, et al., applicants,
v.
BUREAU OF ALCOHOL, TOBACCO, FIREARMS AND EXPLOSIVES, et al.
attorneys: Application for stay presented to THE CHIEF JUSTICE and by him referred to the Court denied.

Applicants requests that if we deny this application we grant a limited stay of 120 hours to allow them to come into compliance with the Final Rule. We refer the issue of such a stay to the D.C. Circuit for its consideration.
casebody.head_matter:
Damien GUEDES, et al., applicants,
v.
BUREAU OF ALCOHOL, TOBACCO, FIREARMS AND EXPLOSIVES, et al.
No. 18A1019.
Supreme Court of the United States
April 5, 2019.
Application for stay presented to THE CHIEF JUSTICE and by him referred to the Court denied.
Applicants requests that if we deny this application we grant a limited stay of 120 hours to allow them to come into compliance with the Final Rule. We refer the issue of such a stay to the D.C. Circuit for its consideration.
Justice THOMAS and Justice GORSUCH would grant the application.
